18#include "ZXContainerAlgorithms.h"
19
20#include <algorithm>
21#include <cstddef>
22#include <cstdint>
23#include <numeric>
24#include <vector>
25
26namespace ZXing {
27
28using PatternRow = std::vector<uint16_t>;
29
30class PatternView
31{
32 using Iterator = PatternRow::const_pointer;
33 Iterator _data = nullptr;
34 int _size = 0;
35 Iterator _base = nullptr;
36 Iterator _end = nullptr;
37
38public:
39 using value_type = PatternRow::value_type;
40
41 PatternView() = default;
42 PatternView(const PatternRow& bars)
43 : _data(bars.data() + 1), _size(bars.size()), _base(bars.data()), _end(bars.data() + bars.size())
44 {}
45 PatternView(Iterator data, int size, Iterator base, Iterator end) : _data(data), _size(size), _base(base), _end(end) {}
46
47 Iterator data() const { return _data; }
48 Iterator begin() const { return _data; }
49 Iterator end() const { return _data + _size; }
50
51 value_type operator[](int i) const
52 {
53// assert(i < _count);
54 return _data[i];
55 }
56
57 int sum(int n = 0) const { return std::accumulate(_data, _data + (n == 0 ? _size : n), 0); }
58 int size() const { return _size; }
59
60 int index() const { return _data - _base; }
61 int pixelsInFront() const { return std::accumulate(_base, _data, 0); }
62 bool isAtFirstBar() const { return _data == _base + 1; }
63 bool isAtLastBar() const { return _data + _size == _end - 1; }
64 bool isValid() const { return _data < _end; }
65
66 template<bool acceptIfAtFirstBar = false>
67 bool hasQuiteZoneBefore(float scale) const
68 {
69 return (acceptIfAtFirstBar && isAtFirstBar()) || _data[-1] >= sum() * scale;
70 }
71
72 template<bool acceptIfAtLastBar = true>
73 bool hasQuiteZoneAfter(float scale) const
74 {
75 return (acceptIfAtLastBar && isAtLastBar()) || _data[_size] >= sum() * scale;
76 }
77
78 PatternView subView(int offset, int size = 0) const
79 {
80// if(std::abs(size) > count())
81// printf("%d > %d\n", std::abs(size), _count);
82// assert(std::abs(size) <= count());
83 if (size == 0)
84 size = _size - offset;
85 else if (size < 0)
86 size = _size - offset + size;
87 return {begin() + offset, std::max(size, 0), _base, _end};
88 }
89
90 bool skipPair()
91 {
92 _data += 2;
93 return isValid();
94 }
95
96 bool skipSymbol()
97 {
98 _data += _size;
99 return isValid();
100 }
101
102 bool skipSingle(int maxWidth)
103 {
104 _data += 1;
105 return _data <= _end && _data[-1] < maxWidth;
106 }
107};
108
109/**
110 * @brief The BarAndSpace struct is a simple 2 element data structure to hold information about bar(s) and space(s).
111 *
112 * The operator[](int) can be used in combination with a PatternView
113 */
114template <typename T>
115struct BarAndSpace
116{
117 using value_type = T;
118 T bar = {}, space = {};
119 // even index -> bar, odd index -> space
120 T& operator[](int i) { return reinterpret_cast<T*>(this)[i & 1]; }
121 T operator[](int i) const { return reinterpret_cast<const T*>(this)[i & 1]; }
122 bool isValid() const { return bar != T{} && space != T{}; }
123};
124
125using BarAndSpaceI = BarAndSpace<PatternView::value_type>;
126
127/**
128 * @brief FixedPattern describes a compile-time constant (start/stop) pattern.
129 *
130 * @param N number of bars/spaces
131 * @param SUM sum over all N elements (size of pattern in modules)
132 * @param IS_SPARCE whether or not the pattern contains '0's denoting 'wide' bars/spaces
133 */
134template <int N, int SUM, bool IS_SPARCE = false>
135struct FixedPattern
136{
137 using value_type = PatternRow::value_type;
138 value_type _data[N];
139 constexpr value_type operator[](size_t i) const noexcept { return _data[i]; }
140};
141
142template <int N, int SUM>
143using FixedSparcePattern = FixedPattern<N, SUM, true>;
144
145template <int N, int SUM>
146float IsPattern(const PatternView& view, const FixedPattern<N, SUM, false>& pattern, float moduleSizeRef = 0.f)
147{
148 int width = view.subView(0, N).sum();
149 if (SUM > N && width < SUM)
150 return 0;
151
152 const float moduleSize = (float)width / SUM;
153 if( !moduleSizeRef )
154 moduleSizeRef = moduleSize;
155
156 for (size_t x = 0; x < N; ++x)
157 // the offset of 0.5 is to make the code less sensitive to quantization errors for small (near 1) module sizes.
158 // TODO: review once we have upsampling in the binarizer in place.
159 if (std::abs(view[x] - pattern[x] * moduleSize) > moduleSizeRef * 0.5f + 0.5f)
160 return 0;
161
162 return moduleSize;
163}
164
165template <int N, int SUM>
166float IsPattern(const PatternView& view, const FixedPattern<N, SUM, true>& pattern, float moduleSizeRef = 0.f)
167{
168 // note: fully optimized with at compile-time known constants in pattern, this code
169 // should be as fast as IsPattern in case it is called with a pattern without '0's.
170 // As of gcc-9, this is not the case.
171
172 int width = 0;
173 for (size_t x = 0; x < N; ++x)
174 width += view[x] * (pattern[x] > 0);
175
176 const float moduleSize = (float)width / SUM;
177 if( !moduleSizeRef )
178 moduleSizeRef = moduleSize;
179
180 for (size_t x = 0; x < N; ++x)
181 if (pattern[x]) {
182 if (std::abs(view[x] - pattern[x] * moduleSize) > moduleSizeRef / 2)
183 return 0;
184 } else {
185 if (view[x] < 1.5f * moduleSizeRef)
186 return 0;
187 }
188
189 return moduleSize;
190}
191
192template<int LEN, typename Pred>
193PatternView FindPattern(const PatternView& view, Pred isPattern, float quiteZoneScale)
194{
195 auto window = view.subView(0, LEN);
196 if (window.isAtFirstBar() && isPattern(window))
197 return window;
198 while (window.skipPair()) {
199 // Look for guard symbol with sufficient whitespace in front (>= percentage of pattern width).
200 if (window.hasQuiteZoneBefore(quiteZoneScale) && isPattern(window))
201 break;
202 }
203 return window;
204}
205
206template <int LEN, int SUM, bool IS_SPARCE>
207PatternView FindPattern(const PatternView& view, const FixedPattern<LEN, SUM, IS_SPARCE>& pattern, float quiteZoneScale)
208{
209 return FindPattern<LEN>(
210 view, [&pattern](auto window) { return IsPattern(window, pattern); }, quiteZoneScale);
211}
212
213} // ZXing
